name: Orbem Wars
description:
Orbem Wars is a full-blown multiplayer Tower Defense game. Set in a distant future in which humankind has ventured into space in search of riches. Driven by your own pursuit of power, you play a mercenary. You venture out into the constellation of Ehen, take on contracts for various factions, and could become a well-rewarded hero of galactic events that changes the course of humankind.

The game has several game modes (some still under development)

  • PVE campaign
  • PVP arena-style leagues
  • Large-scale multiplayer events that push the story forward
  • Short-term events in which players compete (leaderboards)

In the future, we look to implement mechanics like guilds and alliances, guild warfare, planetary development, resource system

--- HOW TO GET STARTED ---

Download the launcher and run it to download the gamefiles (1gb).

Account creation is done inside the game. There is a tutorial available to get you started. Some starter equipment is provided as well. 

Good luck mercenary :)

--- STAGES & DEVELOPMENT ---

Orbem Wars has 5 stages of development, currently in Alpha

  1. Alpha, started in April 2021
  2. Beta, expected Dec/Jan
  3. Early Access release, expected H1 2023
  4. v1.0 Release, summer/autumn 2023
  5. Continuous expansion

As the game is in development, we appreciate any and all feedback, bug reports, and reports on hardware compatibility issues. Join our Discord and use the bug-report and make-suggestion channels (https://discord.com/invite/Q2fWU6kzAv, note the anti-spam verification timer (15min))

--- (HARDWARE) REQUIREMENTS ---

We support Windows and Linux during Alpha. 
Android and Mac at a later date.

Hardware requirements are generally low:

  • Dual-core 3,0GHZ CPU
  • GPU with OpenGL3.1 support is required (pretty much any GPU from 2014 - later)
  • 1GB of drive space
  • 8GB RAM minimum, 16GB recommended
